external_games.name: Mom Baby Emergency Pregnant Surgery Simulator

name: Pregnant Mom Emergency Surgery
summary: It’s time for another surgery simulator process so stand in your hospital because pregnant mommies from all around are waiting for their operation in the best hospital of the best doctor! We have some mommies who are here for their check up and some mommies have their emergency pregnant surgery shortly so take them in the emergency room and prepare them for the surgery!
